directions: In a blender blend all ingredients until smooth but still thick. Divide mixture between 2 large stemmed glasses and garnish with mint and/or pineapple.
ingredients: 1/3 cup light or amber rum, or to taste
2 tablespoons superfine sugar, or to taste
2 teaspoons fresh lime juice, or to taste
Garnish: mint sprigs and/or pineapple chunks skewered with wooden picks
title: Pineapple Mint Frozen Daiquiri
